sentences.en: a secret underground passage
sentences.cn: 地下秘密通道

sentences.en: an underground passage
sentences.cn: 地下通道

sentences.en: Harry stepped into the passage and closed the door behind him.
sentences.cn: 哈里走进过道，随手关上了门。

sentences.en: He quoted a passage from the minister's speech.
sentences.cn: 他引用了部长的一段讲话。

sentences.en: He read a passage from Emerson.
sentences.cn: 他读了一段爱默生的作品。

sentences.en: He read out a short passage from the Bible.
sentences.cn: 他朗读了《圣经》里的一小段。

sentences.en: He reads a passage from Milton.
sentences.cn: 他读了一节弥尔顿的诗。

sentences.en: he worked his passage home as a steward.
sentences.cn: 他在船上作服务员以抵交回家的船费。

sentences.en: It's been 200 years since the passage of the Bill of Rights.
sentences.cn: 《人权法案》通过已经200年了。

sentences.en: Mack knew this passage by heart.
sentences.cn: 麦克会背这一段。

sentences.en: Mr Thomas would be given safe passage to and from Jaffna.
sentences.cn: 托马斯先生可以安全地往来于贾夫纳。

sentences.en: My office is just along the passage.
sentences.cn: 我的办公室就在过道旁边。

sentences.en: My parents couldn’t afford the passage to America.
sentences.cn: 我父母付不起去美国的船费。

sentences.en: Prue entered the passage in her notebook, then read it aloud again.
sentences.cn: 普吕把那一段写在她的笔记本上，然后又大声念了一遍。

sentences.en: The bridge isn’t strong enough to allow the passage of heavy vehicles.
sentences.cn: 那座桥不够坚固，无法让重型车辆通过。

sentences.en: The gaslights in the passage would be on, turned low.
sentences.cn: 走廊里的煤气灯应该是开着的，调得比较暗。

sentences.en: The passage of heat through rock is extremely slow.
sentences.cn: 热在岩石中传导得极慢。

sentences.en: This little room was along a passage and down some steps.
sentences.cn: 这个小房间在沿着走廊再下几级台阶的地方。

sentences.en: Two men suddenly elbowed a passage through the shoppers.
sentences.cn: 两名男子突然用肘在购物者中挤出一条路。

sentences.en: We walked down a narrow passage to the back of the building.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着一条狭窄的通道来到大楼的后面。

sentences.en: We'd arrived the day before after a 10-hour passage from Swansea.
sentences.cn: 从斯旺西出发航行10小时后，我们于前天到达。

sentences.en: With incredible swiftness she ran down the passage.
sentences.cn: 她沿通道飞奔而去。

sentences.en: You may have free passage across our territory whenever you require it.
sentences.cn: 无论你什么时候需要，都可以自由穿过我们的领地。

words.tran_cn: 尚可的；可通行的；（钱币等）可流通的
及格；经过；护照；途径；传球；vi. 经过；传递；变化；终止；vt. 通过；经过；传递
过路人；旅客；考试合格者

phrases.tran_cn: 流道；通流部分；液流通道
自由通行；[法]自由通行权
油道；润滑油道；润滑油孔
n. [人类学]通过仪式；人生大事及其庆祝仪式（常用复数形式表示）
地下通道；地底通道；地下道

trans.tran_cn: 通道，走廊，段落，流逝，通过，旅程，通行许可
trans.tran_en: a long narrow area with walls on either side which connects one room or place to another
